Articles.Content:
Image says it all!

Looks like bug 3847 is still with us. Has anyone discovered a workaround?

We discovered a workaround a long time ago but until 1.0 it was possible to get into the same situation without the part needed to work around. Launch Stability Enhancers, you can get them much earlier in the tech tree now, put them on all rockets.

Well that's just my poor luck then! For whatever reason I guess I never encountered this last time I started a career game. Now in my 1.0 career I spent all my science to get early airplane parts just before encountering this. No launch gantry for me until I figure out how to earn another 40 science then.

Hmm ... its already at 30 parts too, I wonder if I can shave something off and shim a decoupler under there.
Sometimes I can get around the problem by moving the ship in the VAB so it launches on a different part of the launchpad.
